name: Mp3tageditor
tagline: A light weight mp3 tag editor tool
body:
![Main window](https://a.fsdn.com/con/app/proj/jmp3tageditor/screenshots/mp3tagimage.jpg)
## Features:
 1. Support for ID3v1 tags.
 2. Support for ID3v2 tags.
 3. User can change album image.
 4. Very lightweight.
 5. Portable (no need to install).
[https://sourceforge.net/projects/jmp3tageditor/](Sourceforge download link)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
